abstract: Donald J Trump's views on gay rights and same-sex marriage set him apart from rest of 2016 Republican field; Trump is not as accepting as Democratic party, but he is open about having friends and employees who are gay and has history of supporting charities that benefit gay community.
lead_paragraph: His ease with gay people does not seem to be the result of deep soul searching, but, rather, the product of the Manhattan social and political world he has inhabited the past five decades.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s More Accepting Views on Gay Issues Set Him Apart in G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: Trump Flouts G.O.P. Dogma on Gay Issues

snippet: His ease with gay people does not seem to be the result of deep soul searching, but, rather, the product of the Manhattan social and political world he has inhabited the past five decades.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
